name: Curses!
description:
Curses! is a two player competitive wizard dueling game, in which you craft your own spells! Combine magical words to create unique effects and bewitch your opponent!

Controls:

Keyboard

Player 1: WASD to move. J,K, and L for spell combinations.

Player 2: Arrow keys to move. Numpad 0,1, and 2, for spell combinations

X360 Controller:

Left stick to move. X. A and B for spell combinations.
